snippet: Van Wagner Communications in New York is acquiring the Lightship Group, which operates ad blimps, and the American Blimp Corporation in Hillsboro, Ore., which designs and builds them.
abstract: Van Wagner Communications in New York is acquiring the Lightship Group, which operates ad blimps, and the American Blimp Corporation in Hillsboro, Ore., which designs and builds them.

headline.main: Outdoor Ad Company Already Had Planes, Now Adds Blimps
